thread.title: BRIEF-Airbus Announces A320neo Pratt & Whitney GTF engine issue

title: BRIEF-Airbus Announces A320neo Pratt & Whitney GTF engine issue

organizations.name: brief-airbus announces a320neo pratt & whitney gtf

text:
February 9, 2018 / 7:57 PM / a minute ago BRIEF-Airbus Announces A320neo Pratt & Whitney GTF engine issue Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - AIRBUS GROUP: * A320NEO PRATT & WHITNEY GTF ENGINE ISSUE 
* ISSUE IDENTIFIED ON A LIMITED NUMBER OF RECENTLY DELIVERED PRATT & WHITNEY GTF ENGINES AFFECTING THE HIGH PRESSURE COMPRESSOR AFT HUB * AIRBUS AND PRATT & WHITNEY ARE ASSESSING THE SITUATION. 
* EASA, THE EUROPEAN AVIATION SAFETY AGENCY HAS PUBLISHED AN EMERGENCY AIRWORTHINESS DIRECTIVE. 
* AIRBUS HAS INFORMED ITS AFFECTED A320NEO CUSTOMERS AND OPERATORS. Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) (Gdynia Newsroom)
